channel.title: Few Simple Problems

item.title: Few Simple Problems
item.dc:creator: @Wildcat_240 Wildcat_240
item.description:
@Wildcat_240 wrote:

[quote=“Wildcat_240, post:1, topic:120165”]4) I’ve used several tut’s on how to make somewhere a SafeZone, but they dont work :eek: Note: I have this code in client.java: public boolean inSafezone() { // by Frost if((absX >=2708 && absX <=2816 && absY >=3149 && absY <=3235 ) || (absX >=3464 && absX <=3510 && absY >=9480 && absY <=9519 ) || (absX >=2438 && absX <=2447 && absY >=3082 && absY <=3098 ) || (absX >=3545 && absX <=3582 && absY >=3267 && absY <=3308 ) || (absX >=2812 && absX <=2867 && absY >=3230 && absY <=3310 ) || (absX >=2705 && absX <=2735 && absY >=9800 && absY <=9832 ) || (absX >=2528 && absX <=2548 && absY >=4710 && absY <=4725 ) || (absX >=2370 && absX <=2420 && absY >=5125 && absY <=6169 ) || (absX >=2794 && absX <=2814 && absY >=9190 && absY <=9220 ) || (absX >=3227 && absX <=3239 && absY >=9320 && absY <=9310 ) || (absX >=3021 && absX <=3057 && absY >=4816 && absY <=4850 ) || (absX >=2508 && absX <=2540 && absY >=4627 && absY <=4670 )) return true; else return false; } [/quote]

I have that already Im just wondering if I have to Add somethingn else somewhere to get the safe zone that i added, if((absX >=2708 && absX <=2816 && absY >=3149 && absY <=3235 ) To work…

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @crakaman crakaman
item.description:
@crakaman wrote:

well for the Safe zones you have the get the cords in a box example this is the barrows rooms for the barrows brothers

(absX >= 9725 && absX <= 9669 && absY >= 3532  && absY <= 3585) ||

the box as a southwest northwest

                  southeast          North east

i think thats it

item.title: Few Simple Problems
item.dc:creator: @Wildcat_240 Wildcat_240
item.description:
@Wildcat_240 wrote:

  1. What’s the code I would put to give some one an item (Like, You mine a rock, you get an ore, or you thieve from a stall, You get Money/an Item)

  2. Is there an Animations List somewhere that I can download/look at. (The one on satan’s isle isnt really…correct)

  3. Im using satan’s Isle, But I’m wanting to make it so you can teleport, how would I go about doing this.

  4. I’ve used several tut’s on how to make somewhere a SafeZone, but they dont work :eek: Note: I have this code in client.java: public boolean inSafezone() { // by Frost if((absX >=2708 && absX <=2816 && absY >=3149 && absY <=3235 ) || (absX >=3464 && absX <=3510 && absY >=9480 && absY <=9519 ) || (absX >=2438 && absX <=2447 && absY >=3082 && absY <=3098 ) || (absX >=3545 && absX <=3582 && absY >=3267 && absY <=3308 ) || (absX >=2812 && absX <=2867 && absY >=3230 && absY <=3310 ) || (absX >=2705 && absX <=2735 && absY >=9800 && absY <=9832 ) || (absX >=2528 && absX <=2548 && absY >=4710 && absY <=4725 ) || (absX >=2370 && absX <=2420 && absY >=5125 && absY <=6169 ) || (absX >=2794 && absX <=2814 && absY >=9190 && absY <=9220 ) || (absX >=3227 && absX <=3239 && absY >=9320 && absY <=9310 ) || (absX >=3021 && absX <=3057 && absY >=4816 && absY <=4850 ) || (absX >=2508 && absX <=2540 && absY >=4627 && absY <=4670 )) return true; else return false; }

Thanks for any of your help, And thanks for At least Looking

Read full topic
